snippet: There is general agreement that the 2012-13 state budget cut was a good idea, but there are differing opinions on how Texas came to need that change in fiscal direction.
lead_paragraph: There is general agreement that the 2012-13 state budget cut was a good idea, but there are differing opinions on how Texas came to need that change in fiscal direction.

headline.seo: Texas Groups Disagree on Why Spending Cap Is Needed in Texas
headline.main: Groups Disagree on Why Spending Cap Is Needed
headline.print_headline: Groups Disagree on Why Spending Cap Is Needed
